name: Neitizen Runner
description:
i built this game while I was learning how to make an 2d infinite runner game and this is the result :) ,  the game is inspired from contra and cyberpunk , I used to love contra games so I found this amazing assets by @Anzimus and had an idea to make this game as in retro contra style  futhermore I decided to add the blinding lights 8 bit sound , y'all can check it out here :- 

Credits :- 

Assets Used :- https://ansimuz.itch.io/warped-city-2

Music Used :-

The game is still in development , so suggestions and feedbacks are enviable :)

Made with Unity :)
